effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
